entry.def: A silencer is a device that is fitted onto a gun to make it very quiet when it is fired.

example.ex: ...a pistol that was equipped with a silencer.

entry.def: A silencer is a device on a car exhaust that makes it quieter.

means.word_mean: 1. short tube attached to the muzzle of a gun that deadens the sound of firing
2. a tubular acoustic device inserted in the exhaust system that is designed to reduce noise
